trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a runtime version that is compatible with this application cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到与此应用程序兼容的运行时版本时，引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref>使用系统提供的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Runtime Missing Exception."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息描述该错误，例如"运行时缺少异常。"的新实例的属性</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref>使用指定的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|中指定的错误消息字符串`message`。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|中指定的错误消息字符串`message`。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.SupportedRuntimeMissingException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the runtime where this application can install and run.
trans-unit.target: 获取此应用程序可以在其中安装和运行的运行时的版本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the runtime version number.
trans-unit.target: 包含运行时版本号的字符串。
